title: Set Up an Email Nurture Sequence
description: A marketer needs to create a 3-part email nurture sequence for new leads who download an ebook.

tasks.description: Create an automated workflow triggered when a user submits the ebook download form.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets up the correct trigger for the sequence.

tasks.description: Schedule the first email (delivering the ebook) to be sent immediately.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds the first email to the workflow.

tasks.description: Schedule a second, follow-up email with related content to be sent 3 days later.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds a time delay and the second email.

tasks.description: Schedule a third email with a soft call-to-action (e.g., 'schedule a demo') to be sent 5 days after that.
